headings.usage: Main headings, hero text, section titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, inputs. Use relaxed line-height.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-4 font-bold hover:scale-105 transition-transform shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-black rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-bold hover:bg-secondary/90
buttons.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.style: bg-[#111111] border border-white/10 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

inputs.hero_search: bg-black/50 border-2 border-white/20 focus:border-primary text-xl p-6 rounded-2xl w-full transition-all shadow-[0_0_40px_rgba(0,0,0,0.5)] placeholder:text-white/20

sidebar.style: w-64 bg-[#0A0A0A] border-r border-white/10 h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 p-6 flex flex-col gap-2

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use a moving gradient border on the main input field to signify 'AI Processing'.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl on sticky headers and modal overlays. Add a 1px white/10 border.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full screen gradients. Use subtle radial gradients (purple/blue) in the background to create depth behind the hero section.
visual_enhancers.noise: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire background to prevent banding and add tactility.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Tracing Beam' effect on the main URL input in the Hero section.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the 'How it Works' section.
Ensure the Dashboard sidebar is fixed and the main content area scrolls.
Use the 'Electric Purple' (#7C3AED) for primary actions and 'Neon Lime' (#CCFF00) for high-priority alerts or 'New' badges.
Simulate the video processing with a progress bar that uses the secondary color.
The 'Results' page should show a grid of video cards. Each card must have a 'Viral Score' badge (e.g., 92/100) in the top right corner.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. If not available, use a similar geometric sans-serif from Google Fonts.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that increases brightness or adds a glow.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
